Question: Dongguan Couso Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Couso Technology Co.,Ltd

Product: CES 2024 Keyboard with QI Charger

- Features a built-in QI charger for wireless charging convenience
- Designed and manufactured with high-quality materials and craftsmanship
- ISO 9001:2015-certified factory with a monthly capacity of 0.5 million units for keyboard production
- Monthly capacity of 0.7 million units for mouse production
- Invests over one million US dollars annually in new product development
- Established business cooperation with customers from over 40 countries
- Anticipated sales volume of 38 million US dollars in 2023
